name: Promotion
description:
A 3 month project designed and made by myself (Chris Phillips) for my university Masters Computer Game Development course. 

Play as 'Bait' the last Black Pawn left in the Chess kingdom. Help him as he fights his way through the world to recover lost pieces and get stronger to recover what he lost.

There is a tutorial in-game

This is only a prototype of what originally designed to be a longer game, as such only the first level is in. 

Only 6 months experience in Game Dev, moved over from a business course so feedback on how to improve or any suggestions are greatly appreciated.
